image.title: The Standard Sports
image.description: Standardmedia.co.ke We deliver breaking news from across Kenya and the globe and information on the latest top stories, business, sports and entertainment headlines. Follow the news as it happens through: special reports, videos, audio, photo gallerie and many more.

item.title: Top European court favors South Africa's Caster Semenya
item.description: European Court of Human Rights ruled in favor of Semenya, a South African Olympian, after international sporting bodies required female athletes with high natural testosterone to take drugs
item.dc:creator: Standard Digital

item.title: Kenya Chipu ready for World Cup U20 showdown at Nyayo
item.description: Chipu captain Kipsang can't wait to make Kenya proud at the global event.

item.title: Maseno seek to end five-year national absence by dethroning Nyanza champs St Mary's Yala
item.description: Oluoch upbeat he has quality to return Maseno to nationals this year.

item.title: Unheralded schools to make debut as Coast games begin
item.description: The Coast region secondary schools Term Two games will begin next week at Voi Secondary School.

item.title: Stage set for Africa shooting event in Mombasa
item.description: Experienced Geoffrey Pesa won both Pistol Carbine Caliber (PCC) U 25 and PCC 26 titles in Bamburi.

item.title: Kylian Mbappe visits father's native home in Cameroon
item.description: France's star footballer Kylian Mbappe arrived in Cameroon to an ecstatic welcome from fans Thursday for a visit that includes charity work with deaf children and a trip to his father's village.
